A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long time Star Wars fan\, I didn't enjoy this at all. Unconvincing villain in Kylo. Too perfect hero in Rey. The character of Luke Skywlaker was wasted and may as well have not been in the movie. Boring casino plot and 'space chase'. I'm glad some people liked it\, but I don't get the hype at all. It felt wonky and slow. No interest in Rian Johnson's new trilogy. No interest in Ep IX after seeing this either.
